divs: Sighting DetailsThe witness showed up at the PA MUFON UFO Public Awareness Day in Harrisburg, PA on May 17, 2008 and gave this report. 10 years ago the witness observed an odd looking metallic flat black colored Saucer with a Dome and no lights fly back & forth over a bunch of trees. The object as per the witness' description look inquisitive in nature by the flight path it took.
trends: There have been 26 other sightings in Harrisburg
There were no other sightings in Harrisburg on or around May 31st 1998
Summary: Flat Black Saucer with a Dome flew back & forth over the trees.
